[ICON_Bullet]Unique to Cahokia and it's Suzerain.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Housing] Housing and +3 [ICON_Gold] Gold.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity from the first [ICON_Charges] Cahokia Mound in a City; +1 [ICON_Amenities] from the second [ICON_Charges] Cahokia Mound at the [ICON_Culture] Natural History Civic.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Food] Food for every 2 adjacent [ICON_District] Districts; reduced to every one adjacent [ICON_District] District at [ICON_Science] Replaceable Parts Technology.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Housing] Housing at the [ICON_Culture] Cultural Heritage Civic.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cannot be built next to another [ICON_Charges] Cahokia Mound.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to Ethiopia.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 Appeal.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain [ICON_Tourism] Tourism at the [ICON_Science] Flight Technology.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Standard [ICON_Faith] Faith adjacency from [ICON_Terrain] Hill and Mountain tiles.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Can only be built on [ICON_Terrain] Hills and Volcanic Soil.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cannot be built next to another [ICON_Charges] Rock-Hewn Church.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to Egypt.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Culture] Culture if on [ICON_Terrain] Floodplains.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Culture] Culture at the [ICON_Culture] Natural History Civic.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith if adjacent to a [ICON_DISTRICT_WONDER] Wonders.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Standard [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Faith] Faith adjacency from [ICON_District] District.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cannot be built on [ICON_Terrain] Snow or Snow tiles.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cannot be next to another [ICON_Charges] Sphinx.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to India.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Housing] Housing and [ICON_Food] Food.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 Appeal.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Faith] Faith if adjacent to a [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Faith] Faith at the [ICON_Culture] Feudalism Civic.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Food] Food if adjacent a [ICON_Charges] Farm.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Housing] Housing at the [ICON_Science] Sanitation Technology.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Food] Food at the [ICON_Culture] Professional Sports Civic.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Various [ICON_Food] Food adjacencies from various [ICON_Charges] Improvements and [ICON_District] Districts.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Prevents [ICON_Food] Food loss during drought.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to the Inca.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Housing] Housing and [ICON_Food] Food.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Production] Production if adjacent to [ICON_Terrain] Fresh Water +2 [ICON_Production] Production if adjacent to [ICON_DISTRICT_AQUEDUCT] Aqueduct.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Various [ICON_Food] Food adjacencies from various [ICON_Charges] Improvements and [ICON_District] Districts.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to Sumeria.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Gold] Gold, and [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Culture] Culture if adjacent to a [ICON_Terrain] River.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Bonus [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_Faith] Faith from every 2 adjacent [ICON_Charges] Ziggurats; bonus [ICON_Faith] Faith from adjacent [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to Portugal.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Must be built by the [ICON_Unit] Nau in foreign territory.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Production] Production and +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Portuguese [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes gain +1 [ICON_Production] Production and +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold when trading per [ICON_Charges] Feitoria in a City.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Must be built on Coast or Lake tile next to a [ICON_Charges] Bonus or Luxury Resource and cannot be built next to another Feitoria.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cannot be removed or destroyed.

Row.Text: An unworkable early Improvement that deals minor damage to, and exerts zone of control on, hostile units passing through or adjacent to it. Unlocked with Military Engineering and built using a Builder Charge. Does not prevent unit movement through this space.

An unworkable later Improvement that deals moderate damage to, and exerts zone of control on, hostile units passing through or adjacent to it. Unlocked with Rifling and built using a Charge from a Military Engineer. Does not prevent unit movement through this space.

An unworkable early Improvement that deals moderate damage to, and depletes the movement of, hostile units passing directly through it. Unlocked with Construction and built using a Builder Charge. Does not prevent unit movement through this space.

An unworkable later Improvement that deals significant damage to, and depletes the movement of, hostile units passing directly through it. Unlocked with Ballistics and built using a Charge from a Military Engineer. Does not prevent unit movement through this space.

[ICON_Bullet]A early [ICON_Charges] Wall that deals moderate [ICON_Damaged] Damage and Exerts Zone of control on enemy [ICON_Unit] Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-1 [ICON_FOOD] Food, [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, [ICON_Production] Production, [ICON_Gold] Gold, [ICON_Faith] Faith, and Appeal.
[ICON_Bullet]A late [ICON_Charges] Wall that deals moderate [ICON_Damaged] Damage and Exerts Zone of control to enemy [ICON_Unit] Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-1 Appeal.

[ICON_Bullet]A early [ICON_Charges] Trap that deals moderate [ICON_Damaged] Damage to enemy [ICON_Unit] Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-1 [ICON_FOOD] Food, [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, [ICON_Production] Production, [ICON_Gold] Gold, [ICON_Faith] Faith, and Appeal.
[ICON_Bullet]A late [ICON_Charges] Trap that deals moderate [ICON_Damaged] Damage to enemy [ICON_Unit] Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-1 Appeal.
